description:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned in front of the church in Hage Village, a village in the outskirts of the Clover Kingdom. And now, we finally find out the truth behind Yuno`s birth! Meanwhile, while Vice Captain Yuno was away, the Golden Dawn`s headquarters was attacked by the Spade Kingdom. Despite being the most powerful squad out of the Magic Knights, they might have finally met their match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le messager du royaume de Spade
The Messenger from the Spade Kingdom
